wikipedia_page.main: Maria Lamburn (Madalena, Maria Madalena, Galé Ritonic; born 26 November 1960) is a British composer and multi-instrumentalist whose philosophy of 'Living Art' endures through her music and poetry (represented by songs in English and Welsh) and larger scale instrumental scores.

response: Warren arranged and produced a Welsh Hymn Project in 2004, Duw A Wyr (God only Knows) with singer Lleuwen Steffan, which received media exposure on radio and TV in Wales, including a S4C documentary about the making of the album. He has also worked extensively with partner Maria Lamburn, co-producing 3 albums with her and setting up Maizeh Music.

Camberwell Now were formed out of the remnants of This Heat by drummer and vocalist Charles Hayward, bassist and vocalist Trefor Goronwy, who had joined This Heat to replace Gareth Williams after the latter had quit the band, and This Heat's former sound technician Stephen Rickard, who employed field recordings and tape effects. Saxophonist Maria Lamburn joined the group in 1985.
